name: Oh No! A Mouse Saving Simulation
name_original: Oh No! A Mouse Saving Simulation
description:
Have you ever thought about saving  little mice with a mouse (Ironic,isn't it?) and bringing them to their mother while avoiding fire?! Neither did we, until we made this game!

  • Use your mouse to pickup or push the mice before they reach the fire
  • Plan your movement and avoid rushing the mouse towards your targets
  • HIGHLY RECOMMENDED: Use a MOUSE to play this game, use of Touchpads ro any other kind of touch input is not recommended.

Designed and Developed based on the Weekly Game Jam - Week 106 theme: Oh No!
